content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a local department store on a beautiful evening.When i reached my car,and opened the door,i glanced up at the gorgeous sunset.To the south i saw glowing copper in the glowing light a hovering object.Quiet as a cloud.Rather large it appeared cigar shaped at first with a strange protrusion in the nose.It was not a natural object,nor was it anything considered conventional.Oddly it was totally still.I keep watching,my eyes frozen in place.This must be a blimp,etc?No it was solid,and too flat.I was hoping for a witness,and i even wanted to run and get someone.A women approached her toyoto odyssey.Do you see what i do?"yes "she said.Stood a moment at her vehicles door,than slipped in it,and left.Alone i    continued to observe this thing just hanging there.Than the nose tilted slightly and it moved ever so slowly across the sky to the northeast.Dipping a bit,than leveling dipping abit,than leveling.As it silently mved its shape beam more of a delta.I saw no lights,jets,roters,or engines of any kind.Its shape was flat in the year,with rounded edges.Shiny metallic veins still glowed copper or bronze in the sunlight.It disappered behind trees.Came out,than ducked behind them again til i could see it no longer.Why didn't i chase it?Why didn't i     run into rite aide and get a disposable camera?Call the police?I am       upset,and have recurring chills over this when i think of it.I don't drink,nor am i a ufo enthusiast or sci fi enthusiast.I am very well read though,and have a curious open and honest mind.I saw a classic ufo.I wish i could of taken a picture.This bothers me.I called the local airport and they said that there were not any unsual aircrft there or known in the area.Blimps ballons etc.This was very real.I relive it agan and again in my mind.
content.summary: I am still shaken about seeing a classic ufo in the sunset.It was there before me,and i can't get it out of my mind.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear blue sky, some wispy clouds.  my wife and i noticed a cylinder shaped object moving across the sky.  it was travelling from a south to north/north-east direction.  elevation angle was about 45 degrees.  would estimate elevation to be about 3-4 miles.  the object
was cylinder shaped when we first observed it,  and changed shape to disc
as it travelled further away from us.  the object shimmered against the
sunlight,  appearing to be metallic.  it moved in a slow, constant direction.  it did not travel horizon to horizon, but appeared to leave our sight by travelling up and outward from our view.  i was able to take a digital picture of it as it appeared to be a disc shape.  we both did not believe this object to be any commercial aircraft, nor appear to be anything "normal" in our sky.
content.summary: Slowly moving cylinder/disc ufo

content.detailedDescription: I and my best friends son were deer hunting on property we lease, located 5 miles north and 2 miles east of freedom oklahoma, locqted in woods county. we were sitting in his jeep with our binoculars both of which have image stabilization in them, so we were able to see this object very well. this object traveled like a baloon, in that it never changed direction or altitude or speed. later that day i called my son who informed me that the news was talking about weather baloons that were being released and said they were kite like in shape with right angles and sharp points on the edge, more like a flying box kite. what we saw was a sphere in shape, it was white and the surface looked like the mateial of a movie screen, sorry, but that is the only way i kno to discribe it, but,,,,, it also had what looked like smaller semispheres that were atached to the surface that were moving in a counter clockwise direction or from my left to my right. at times, the top of this sphere would be a light blue, while the bottom would be a light brown, while leaving the center with the little circling spheres to remain white. we watched this thing for about 45 mins, in the back ground we had two drilling rigs to use for a reference to give us some idea of the distance, and we know for a fact they are 2 miles from our lacation and this object was about half again that far, and if that distance is correct then we estimate the object to be 40 -50 feet in dia. maybe more, cause we cant be for sure of the distance, but it was clearly visible to the naked eye, i was using 10x40 binocs and he my friends son was using 15x 50 binocs, made by cannon. i am not saying this thing was not a man made object, im just telling you what we have seen, and at the same time wondering if you may have some info as to what we actually saw? we do not have any pictures, we were actually hoping you might actually have some pics of something like i have discribed and maybe you could send them to me so i can see if any of them are what we saw, thank you for your time and please e-mail me and let me know what you think, thank you dennis l jackson.
content.summary: Sphere shaped object traveling slowly from s.W. to n.E. moved like a baloon but didnt look like a baloon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a gathering of friends one night during one of my weekends back from ball state university. i'm a computer science major, in the armed forces, and a pretty big skeptic on the field of ufo's.

my friend jack lawson and i volunteered to run to wal-mart to pick up a take-and-bake pizza. coming down ind-109, i caught a glimmer in the upper portion of my windshield and glanced at it. what i saw was a garish blue light in the shape of something between an arrow, football, egg, and triangle. it had a medium-sized tail, and was about as low as a helicopter. i knew it wasn't a military aircraft (as i stated, i'm in the armed forces, and i know what to look for in a plane or helo). this thing was moving pretty quickly. as i said in the brief, this thing transverses the entire sky in about two-to-five seconds and suddenly disappears into thin air. jack immediately asked me "did you see that, kyle?", so i knew it wasn't just my eyes playing tricks on me. 

after i lost sight of it, i felt rather confused and tried to play it off as some strange ignition of gas or possibly borialis or shooting star or meteor, but it was just too low to the ground and swift moving. when we got to wal-mart, jack went to the restroom (apparently this thing really did scare him to the point of near loss of bladder control) and he sat on the bench outside of the men's room with his head in his hands. he had seen it for a longer period of time than i had, since i was driving and had my eyes trained on the traffic in front of me.
content.summary: Spotted an arrow-shaped blue light above the highway, crossed night sky in about two seconds, disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
i posted this on "project avalon" a few days ago..
http://www.Projectavalon.Net/forum/showthread.Php?T=4721
i have been watching this in the sky for over a month..

update:
sunday oct 11 - 11.30am

night before last.. i didnt see any.. i didnt get home until after 10pm..
last night i was workin on my sons car..Didnt spend to much time lookin..
but i did see 3...


im not one for bulls**t.. i dont want or need attention..
im telling you this for your sake.. because i think its important..
you are free to think as you wish...

so for your information.. and in hopes that more of you will
be able to see them too.. ill describe what im seeing in better detail...
and how or what im doing to find them in the sky..

in the beginning:
one morning about 5 weeks ago.. i got up like i always do about 4:30 am
and went out to the backyard to smoke a cigerette.. facing west..
i happened to look up (60 deg above horizon).. i saw a group of faint
stars movin around each other.. as i focused on them.. i noticed lines
of lite flashing between some of them 4 or 5 times... then one of them
left the group and headed east.. running late.. i went inside and told my
wife what i had seen and got ready for work.. 5:45 am..I pulled my car
out of the garage into the driveway.. got out to smoke another cig..
looking up at the western sky where i saw the others wondering about
what i seen earlier.. suddenly a bright star caught my attention in the
south (5 deg above horizon).. far away but moving towards the north east
curving towards (me) the north loosing altitude and getting brighter and
brighter.. 10 times brighter than any of the other stars in the sky..
then just disappeared.. a second later.. just to the right of where
it disappeared there was a sequence of 5 flashes of white lite about
a split second of each other and just to the right of each previous..
stunned but running late.. i got into the car and went to work..

later that night:
i get home from work.. eat dinner.. watch the news.. told my wife what
i seen in the driveway that morning..And went back outside in the backyard
just after dusk.. facing west.. looked up at the sky and noticed a star in
the southwest (20 deg above horizon) moving east.. i called my wife outside
to see.. as we watched it move east it faded in and out and seemed to make
slight correctons to the left and right..Speed up and slow down.. almost like someone
driving drunk.. then in the southeast sky just disapeared.. suddenly..Back in the
southwest sky.. (20 deg above horizon).. a sequence of 5 flashes of white lite once
again a split second of each other but the first 3 flashes came from one spot..
the next 2 just to the right of each previous..

generaly (last 5 weeks):
they move north to south east to west (viceversa) 80% of the time.. but i have seen
them moving in all directions in all parts of the sky.. 
they do seem to go one way and come back the other soon after ~40% of the time..
usually when traveling north south but not always..

this seemingly "driving drunk" characteristic discribes 75% of these stars that i see..
this makes it obviously "not a satellite" which move at a constant speed/direction w/
no deviation.. satellites dont change speed or direction or make u-turns or hover..
the satellites i see seem to move south to north.. i know their orbits can be fixed..
i imagine one can put a satellite in any orbit...W/ speed and direction constant or fixed..

another common characteristic is the fading in and out... sometimes it seems like
they jump a little bakwards or forwards left right up down as they fade in and out..
i see this about 50% of the time..

ive seen as many as 4 in different parts of the sky at once.. less than a week ago..
i was watching 2 in the sky at once.. one moving south to north one moving west
to east convergeing (at a point facing east looking 75 deg above horizon).. the one
moving north was white and fading in and out.. the one moving east was orange and
wasnt fadeing in and out.. as they converged.. before they crossed paths.. the one
moving north flashed 4 random bursts of bright white flashes as it faded in and out..
at this point just before they crossed.. the orange one moving east let out a burst
of brown plazma or hazy looking field around it in its horizontal plane.. kinda like a
shockwave.. then they crossed at the same point at the same time and went on
theyre ways over the horizons.. ive seen these flashes bye themselves in other
parts of the sky a few differnt times w/ no stars associated w/ them.. a few weeks
ago.. facing west (75 deg above horizon).. i saw a single short "line" of white lite
flash in the sky.. the orientaion of the line was east/west.. (note: the line appeared
all at once.. not from one end growing to the other).. when the lite flashed.. a star
came out of the east end of the line and continued east... very interesting..

recap:
10-8-08 (nitetime)
once again...I saw atleast 10 more... but tonight was significant..
tonight i feel that whatever it is im seeing has acknowledged that
im watching them.. while facing east..I was watching another star
in the north/east moving south over houston.. as it passed a few
miles south of 1-10 south/east of my position.. it stoped and made
a left hand u-turn.. then gained altitude as it started to head north
east then stopped completley...Hovered around unsteadily.. i stuck
my head in the back door and called for my wife to come out and see
this one...She came out.. and as we were watching it for a minute ..
out of the east an orange-ish sparkling lite headed west about
300 - 400 ft off the ground came directly over our house at about 50 mph...
it made no sound at all.. it was just cruisin west... almost all the others
that i have been watching (approx 70 in the last 4 weeks) appear to be
well above 30,000 ft.. but this one was very low and came right at us..
right over my house.. to me it seemed to be an acknowledgment..
why all of the sudden so low and right over my house.. while im watching
one of them in another part of the sky..?

due to this low flybye over my house..
i think they somehow know i see them..
i think they wanted me to know that they know..

lately i have wondered if i was special because of what i see that others dont..
i am not... i think its simply because i looked to see.. look up and see the truth..!!

how i find them in the sky:
its really very easy.. all i do is look up in the sky.. in sections systematicly..
(imagine a grid of rectangles or squares).. i focus on groups of stars at once..
paying attention to their fixed postions relative to each other and look for moving
objects against a fixed background of stars in each grid/section.. i focus on the fainter
stars in each grid to adjust my eyes to see more lite.. ussually "they" are easy to see..
but some are very faint.. i dont want to miss those.. i have noticed i have gotten
better at finding them in the sky as time goes on and look at bigger sections of sky
at one time now.. i know what im looking for now..

hopefully this will help others see what i see....
i havent reported this to anyone officially.. they will think im crazy..
maybe if others can also see.. we can come together as a group..
and discuss what to do next... how or if we should disclose this info..
content.summary: The stars have been moving for over a month in katy tx

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having my am coffee and was watching the stars and even saw a satelite. i live in the country outside of austin and have no light pollution. i saw a couple of shooting stars then i noticed a cluster of lights that were bouncing around. there was one brighter light pulsating then about 7 smaller ones that would bounce around.The smaller ones looked like they were merging into the larger light.The brighter light would also move around. i saw the same thing in a different location several  mornings ago but in a different location. that cluster was not there this am- if it was a group of stars they should had been in the same place i  originally saw them.Eventually the sun came up.The lights were in the sw direction between san antonio and austin.
content.summary: Bright light with small cluster of lights bouncing around

content.detailedDescription:
i was returning home from a local high school football game.  i was 16 years old at the time. i left early, before the game was over.  i walked from the football stadium, located in peckville, pennsylvania, to my home, in jessup, pennsylvania.  three blocks from my home, i sighted a huge, disk-shaped ufo.  it was very large, glowing white, turret on top, with a row of rectangular windows. the bottom had three large, glowing spheres, with a central, flat disk.  the object did not make any sound.
   several friends of mine, that remained at the football game saw a glowing object, but their view was somewhat obscurred by the white lights at the stadium.
  i can't remember if it was a day alter, or several days, when a black limousine appeared at my home, with four black suited men inside, also wearing black hats.  the limousine had no insignas or license number.  i saw this because, although at night, there was a street lamp across the street.  the men sat, motionless, staring straight ahead, in the vehicle.
the vehicle returned for the next few evenings.
   i have had several other ufo sighting experiences.  two diamond-shaped ufo's in peckville, pennsylvania in 2002.  a triangular ufo in dunmore, pennsylvania 2003, also sighted by my fiance.  several ufo's over a cemetary in dunmore, pennsylvania in 2005, photographed by ufo researcher, mary sutherland.  my fiance and i sighted several strange lights in february, 2008, when we were living in orlando, florida.
   i have been searching for answers to these anomalous experiences.  please help me.
   sincerely,[pid]
content.summary: I sighted a large disk-shaped ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my girlfriend back home as we saw a movie and had coffee at starbucks.  it was around 9:30 p.M. on friday october 10th.  i was on hershel avenue in hyde park when i looked ahead and noticed three orange and red balls of fire in the sky.  then i saw another one trailing the first three.  i told my girlfriend what is that up in the sky?  she said that is odd.  the another one came over the car followed by another moving from the east to the west at a good clip and a say about 15 thousand feet in the sky.  

i stopped the car in the road as nobody was behind us.  there were a few cars coming the other way but they just past on the other side of my car.  we got out of the car and looked up and saw more of these balls of fire pass over my car.  there was no noise so they couldn't be an airplane or a hilicopter.  we got back into the car and drove to her apartment which is less than a mile from where we saw the lights.  as we drove west we could still see the lights in the sky going due west but as we got to her apartment the light disapeared in sky or they were out of sight. the lights followed each other.  there may have been a cluster of three or four but then there were several in session.  they headed off to the west but then curved off to the north west before going out of sight.

after getting back to her apartment i parked the car and we both go out of the car and went towards the street.  i looked into the east sky and saw one more coming right at us.  there look there is another one i said but not as bright in color.  sure enough it was the same thing we saw on hershel avenue.  we both watched it but the red glow started to fade as it got closer to us.  almost right in front of us in the south east sky it disapeared from sight. again there was no sound

two people were walking down the street and i asked them if they saw anything in the clear skys.  they listen to our story but said they never seen anything but they would look in the sky on their way home.  my girlfriend adn i went in her apartment and made some phone calls to local tv news stations but again nobody called anything of that nature into the stations.  then we called the local newspaper and no luck then we call lunken airport but we didn't call the tower just a local airline that said they hadn't had any reports of unusual sightings in the sky.

saturday october 11th i check the local news and newspapers and there was nothing about the sightings.  then i checked the internet and nothing.  when i got home on friday night i thought many it may have been a meteor or a comet burining off in the earths atmosphere.  not sure but you would think somebody would have saw something.

when i got to work today one of my employees said they were driving home last night on i 71 going north when he saw the object i was talking about in my experience the night before.  he said the object was red or orange looked like a ball in the sky and when straight down and disappeared.  he had his son in the car and his son saw the same thing and was shocked.

so it looks like one person saw whatever it was.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was a red to orange ball maybe 15 in all flying in sequence behind each other

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving on 321 s in north carolina, a circular source of light to my right and close to the horizon caught my attention.  at first, the object was still, yet it emitted a skinny ray of blue light.  my first reaction was not to jump to conclusions, so i tried to locate the moon but had some difficulty since it was extremely cloudy.  although earlier in the night i had noticed the moon and knew it wasn't that close to the horizon.  luckily, the clouds became patchy and i was able to see that it was clearly not the moon.  the object continued to move about, shining down this blue beam.  when it was closer to the horizon, what i believe to be the craft was round and circular.  after watching it for a couple of minutes it disappeared.  strange, i thought.  then i looked in my rear view mirror and it was behind me.  not directly overhead, but behind me a ways.  at this point, the craft was more of an oval shape.  it darted around in sweeping motions, always emitting the blue beam.  it stayed behind me for a couple of minutes and then disappeared.  at first i was astonished to have seen it, then as it changed direction and was overhead, my instinctual reaction was fear.  i started shaking and my knees went weak, though i generally do not fear the possibility of extraterrestrial encounters.  this was my third potential ufo encounter and it was by far the most astonishing.  also this could have possibly been in lincoln county, i'm not sure because i didn't know my exact location.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Circular light hidden from plain site by clouds, emitted a blue beam of light constantly

content.detailedDescription: It was me and my father-in-law who is 70 yrs old we both were outside looking up towards the north sky and out of nowhere a saucer shaped craft materialized in front of us about 100ft above and about300yards away from us and flew very slowly allowing both of us to see it very clearly it flew towards the west and approached a low flying helicopter and the lighting was clear allowing us the best view possible if i had a camera it would have been the clearest photo ever printed it was that close then we wondered if the helicopter saw it and as the saucer was about 500 or so yards from the copter it just accelerated up over the copter and sort of just dissappeared before it reached the horizon, i didn't report it before as i didn't no where to report such a thing the is there are alot of sightings hereand we have a non-active air force base here named castle and as a kid i lived near the base and always saw unexplainable objects near or above the base airspace, now this happened about 5 yrs ago but the last two nights me my son and a friend all witnessed these strange star like objects that moved at unbelieveable speed there were two on the 9th 2 days ago and then last night we saw two more but this time they actully crossed paths like on a grid and one of them was much brighter than the other and after a couple of seconds the bright one dimmed to the brightness of the other and shot striaght up towards the moon and then we lost sight of them, this is my fist time reporting but be sure now that i've found mufon i will certainly report all promply. the suacer was incredible though , silver shiny big bright lights on bottom of craft turning counter clockwise with no sound or exaust that was visible. i am a artist and can clearly draw the thing we saw but do not know how to post on computer, a little computer illiterate, so sorry
content.summary: Classic saucer shape with lights on bottom spinning seemed to have port holes

content.detailedDescription:
I was ouat on our deck that evening playing poker on my laptop. our house, and deck face west by southwest. omaha nebraska faces west. 
i first noticed three lights as a sprial light of verying colors pointing down, and to both sides of something. i was dark, and i thought that it was a plane landing at epply air feild. (this if a multiple sighting)
however planes usually have there landing lights on, and this might well have been a plane. but i kept rubbing my eyes to distingush what this was, and could not get a clear distinction of it.  

i watched it for about 1 to 2 minutes.  the light was coming in from the northwest by west area.  then all of the sudden i saw this globe, glowing pure white, as in a snow white light blub, coming in over my left shoulder, from the south  at about i would say 2 to 3 thousand ft.  it was not round like a moon, but m&m shaped.  the configuration really got to me, as it travled quite fast. maybee 500 miles per hr, or faster.  it had no tail, no sound, and seemed to just cruse effertly from the south to the north.  i watched it travle to the north, fully expecting it to crash in north omaha, or somewhere north of that, when it seemed that everyting that i watching stoped for a milisecond, and it dissapeared, then everyting started up again.  where did it go, i do not know. also, the three sprial light dissapered at the same time.  i can believe that the 3 sprial lights could be an plane landing without its running lites on yet, but the other is very different.

now i keep running this over, and over in my mind, as the white color was so prue, that i can't seem to get it out of my mind.  also, i might add that this ran on a straight tajectry, and constantly seemed to be heading downward. 

it had no tail, or fire, or smoke of any kind.

my feelings are, i don't know exactally, never saw anything like this before.  breally butiful white lite to it though, and it seemed to move effertly, as thought no friction to it in the air.
content.summary: About 80 ft. m & m shaped

content.detailedDescription: An ex-girlfriend and i wanted to talk, so we drove to a part of colorado springs off bijou where you have a clear view of cheyenne mountain and most of the city.  we sat on the car hood and cheyenne mountain was straight ahead.  i saw them first, about 7 very bright glowing spheres of light would appear, swiftly move sideways for about 4 seconds, then they all disappeared one by one.  she was on the phone at the time and didn't see it, when i told her she asked if i had been smoking crack.  i told her to watch cheyenne mountain, and sure enough, about 5 minutes later the lights showed up again, this time farther above norad.  they would be "on" for a few seconds, then disappear.  the only thing i could think of was that they were some kind of flare on parachutes, but because of their movement and behavior there's no way that's possible.  i was in such awe while seeing the second ones, i completely spaced the idea of taking a picture of them.  after all the second ones were gone i thought of it and got my camera phone ready, and we stayed there about an hour more, but didn't see anything else.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple white spheres of light appearing and dissapearing over norad

content.detailedDescription: I'm not sure what constellations the cluster is near, but i have been observing it every night for some time now. the cluster moves slowly from the east and is most visible directly over austin between 2-4 am. i am usually asleep by 10 or 11pm, at which point the cluster is barely visible to the east. when i stay up late, i see dim lights, very close to each other, bouncing very quickly, usually in an erratic fashion and in a very tight formation. the number of lights may varry from one to ten or more depending on the given moment. if it were a single star bouncing around, i would probably chalk it up to bad eyesight, but it's hard to rationalize when the lights are so close together. they are obviously not sitting still. one of the lights is brighter than the rest, and the dimmer lights appear to be merging with/ ejecting from within the more intense light. it's very strange and pretty cool to watch. hopefully i'll be able to stay awake long enough to watch the show tonight. set your alarm for three thirty, find a spot where the lights of the city aren't too overwhelming, and you can watch the show as well. i'm guessing theyre visible all over central texas, perhaps even further, although it's hard to judge how far away the cluster actually is.
content.summary: Tight cluster of dim lights that move with the stars through the sky and bounce around every night

content.detailedDescription:
Around 9pm, or a little earlier, on 10/9/08, i was driving north on coit road, in richardson, texas. on my right hand side, i noticed three lights, out my front window, above the 2 story shopping center. i had just past beltline road, which runs perpendicular to coit road. thinking it might have been headlights, or a reflection of light on my front windshield glass, i looked away to watch the road, to deter any accidents. then, looking up again, i saw the 3 lights again, and noticed that they disappeared behind the 11, or so story compass bank building, thereby resulting in my deduction, that these were not a reflection in my window. i also heard no helicopter sounds, nor plane engines (propeller and jet).

the lights were in a straight line, traveling in unison, equidistant apart. as coit road runs north, the 3 lights seemed to be moving north-west. the line they were in seemed to be a slight verticle angle, with the north end higher than the rear.

the lights were not blinking. they did not vary in color, nor have any color, such as red, or blue, or green or yellow. i would describe their source as incandescent. not led, or white...But somewhat warm. they did not vary in size, but were consistent with each other. their size seemed to be that of what a plane would have. however, lacking the ability to determine the distance of the object due to no physical structure of the object, i can not give a size of the object themselves.

as the lights traveled north-west, a forth light appeared, as if behind the middle light, resulting in a box formation, as if to suggest the lights were the underside of a plane or something. they continued to stay in formation, and moved in their direction, with the angle of the lights askewing more and more, once again reaffirming my observation of the lights were affixed to the bottom of the craft. 

i did not feel scared, nor did i notice any radio interference, or light interference. i felt a little excited, as any individual would when seeing something that they could not put the words 'airplane' or 'helicopter' to. i kept thinking to myself "what the hell is that." i did not notice any other drivers trying to the observe the object, because i happened to be too busy watching it myself. as i kept driving, the object kept heading north-west, and out of view. coming home, i told my girlfriend of my observation, and saw nothing on the news, internet, or local newspapers. the day after, i continued to search, but found nothing to my avail.
content.summary: At night, while driving, i look up, see 3 lights. no blinking, no colors, white/warm. first appeared as 3, then, while moving quickly nw, the 3 turned into 4, creating a square pattern, moving in unison. continued to go askew, meaning bottom structure.

content.detailedDescription:
At 7:50 pm i was packing my car for a trip home this weekend from the side of my dorm facing daytona beach international, at embry-riddle aeronautical university (erau). 

at about 7:51pm i briefly turned around to grab my suitcase and glanced up noticing an extremly large bommerang shaped aerocraft that appeared to have just entered the atmosphere. it had 5 lights (all of which where a bright grey in color) and appeared to be at least a mile in length when comparing the cessna's and 737 flying in the area. after i saw it i watched it until it entered cloud cover and from its vector appeared to be heading sw of my position at erau.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flew over daytona beach airport as if entering atmosphere, then proceeded into cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work when i saw a bright shiny silver ball in the sky. the about 5 seconds after i first noticed it, a fire trail started behind it but no smoke . at first i thought it was a meteor but then noticed it was traveling straight up. i watched it for 2 minutes then it was gone.
content.summary: Shiny ball with fire trail

content.detailedDescription:
This was my third sighting over several years in this same area. i live in sw fort worth, texas, within about 5 miles of the naval air station base (formerly carswell afb and before that,the famous fort worth air field to which the debris from the roswell crash was flown to and the famous pics of jesse marcel and the "weather balloon" were foisted on the public).

to that i have to add that i am also real close to highway 377 south which leads to first granbury, then on to stephenville.

living as close to the base as i have for a coupla decades, i am very familiar with the planes that are almost always in the sky around here. from my back yard at night there is hardly a moment when yoy cant see a plane in the sky.

wednesday night i was preparing the hot tub and fireplace for a little family r&r. promptly at 8pm after getting all things in place i sat down in a handy lawn chair and put my feet up on the the brick ledge of the tub and leaned back to take in the sky a little.

as soon as i looked up, a point of light emerged from behind the leaves of a large tree in our yard. it was very high in altitude much like a commercial jet at about 35,000 feet or so. it was bout 35 degrees from the horizon, and i was looking due east which would put it travelling northward.
but make no mistake about it, this was no jet. for one thing, even as far away as it was it was easy to see that the object was spherical in shape and very luminescent, as though lit internally rather than reflecting any available sunlight. it seemed to glow a rich golden color. there were no flashing or different color lights. it did not appear to be traveling on an arc similar to the earth as a plane would, but was doing the opposite......Slowly arcing upwards and fading and growing smaller at an amazing rate. i knocked on my daughters window and told her to come out. by the time she got outside, the object had disappeared outward.....It just went into space. the entire sighting lasted about7 to 10 seconds.

this is the third such object i have seen just like this in the last several years. the first time i saw one of these was on the 377 hiway heading into fort worth from granbury late at night. at first i saw strange red, blue, yellow and greenish lights illumintating the sides of the small rolling hills to one side of the hiway......Very strange as they were moving all around very quickly......Then as i passed the area where the lights were, i saw what i thought at first was a meteor that seemed to shoot high over my vehicle, travelling in the same direction as i was.
as i said, at first i thought it was a meteor, but then i noticed it was too well defined for a meteor and besides that it suddenly slowed down somewhat, did an unbelievable perfect 90 turn to the east and again, shot upwards and off into space at an amazing rate. definitely not a meteor!
content.summary: Spherical point of light, shot outwards, disappeared into space

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying on my bed reading a magazine when i noticed what appeared to be the start of a twister forming. my bed faced two large windows which gave me a panoramic view of the sussex country side. obviously for the uk any form of twister is quite a strange event but i resisted the temptation to take a photograph. i went back to my magazine but would check every couple of minutes to see how it (the twister) was progressing. in the end i succumbed to temptation and took this photo on my mobile phone(sony ericsson d750i). i then went back to my magazine and forgot all about it. in early february 2008 after moving to a new house i needed my mobile phone to take a picture of our electricity meter in order to provide evidence to our utility company. of course this meant downloading all the images from my phone to my pc and it was here that i also viewed my other images taken months before. to my amazement the twister image has to disc shapes in the upper right hand corner of the picture. i swear to god that these were not there at the time. i couldn���t see them with the naked eye. you can see from the photo that i am aiming my camera at the twister. if i'd have seen those at the time i'd be looking at them for sure. 

despite repeated attempts we have failed to reproduce this image. i'm still thinking that it's a cloud of some description but that fails to explain why i did not see them at the time.


a strange event then, what do you make of it?
content.summary: Photograph of twister showed two ufo's when viewed later.

content.detailedDescription:
Was night fishing with 4 other close friends @ our recreation club. there was no other people on the grounds last night. none. i say this because @ first i thought people were shooting fireworks in the sky above our heads. not possible though.

one of my good friends was sitting on the dock directly behind me aproximatly 5 feet away. he said hey look @ that. when he said that everyone who was with us looked striaght above our heads @ the same time which was really erie because its like we all knew what to look for and where to look. as soon as i lifted my chin to look up "bam" a super super bright "white" ball of what looked like to be fire light up the dock the water it light everything up like daytime. i would say about a good 4-5 seconds passed of staring @ this thing which @ the time was staionary but seemed like as soon as we all locked onto it it began to move slowly northeast in the direction of chicago in the next 4 seconds we watched whatever that thing was fly horizontally without sound moving so fast it had to of covered miles before the light completly dissapeared. this thing was only between 1000-3000 ft above. no more than that because i just cant see anyting being that big in mass and farther away than that. it was absolutly mind boggeling as to what we seen. it was so disturbing that i had watery eyes and i dont know why? i want an answer because its just eating me up inside wondering what the hell we all seen. everyone of us texted each other today to see if we were all thinking about it and im guessing if it were you, you would do the same. because we were all thinking about it. the whole thing lasted a miere 8-10 seconds but i will never forget that light. it was amazingly bright and pure but had a undefined edge to it making it appear as a huge white fireball simular to a flair or big big mortar that has a trailing effect. it was not any of these things though i can asure you this. un-explainable

feel free to contact me for more details or if you have any information, maybe someone else seen it as-well or there was a report of it in the area so i can asure me and my friends were didnt imagine it.

thanks ryan
content.summary: Absolutly astounding

content.detailedDescription:
See the strange light at the top of the tree and wonder what it was?

take some pictures of it and also some video. went inside to tell my wife to come out to see it and it was gone.

view direction: ssw of anaheim, near disney land towards the sun set about 7:02pm on 10/08/08
content.summary: Strange light  appeared at an unsual place in sky.

content.detailedDescription: As i arrived home from college on october the 8th i decided that i was going to search for ufo's with my new digital camera. there is a method for catching these during the day which involves taking the inside of a floppy disk out and taping that material to your camera of choice.  so the sory starts by me looking at the sky with my camera and the floppy tape attatched.  it was a very cloudy day but with the techniqe i used it allowed me to see things that could not be seen with the naked eye.  the next moment i noticed a small black dot start moving in very strange movments.  going back from left to right very quickly i decided to record this.  the event lasted for 1 hr and i recored it for 5 minutes.  ive sent my video to robert marsh who gave me the link to this site.  from what he said it seems like he likes the video.  the video clearly shows an object in very thick cloud cover performing moves that an airplane, nor helicopter can make.
content.summary: Black circle

content.detailedDescription:
I swear this to be fact.
 on the morning of febuary 26th, i was somehow encouraged to get up from my desk in my home office and go outside ang simply look up. i did so and there the craft was.  as i viewed the craft, i could see and feel the energy being exhausted from the craft, like waves through my body. a tremendose wind preceeded the event.
 the craft was completely silent. a large triangle with all smooth, rounded edges. it was non-descript in color, grey/black. the craft travelled slow and steady with no woble at maybe 15-20mph heading sw. it travelled forward as one of the points of the triangle was clearly the lead or front of the craft. near the center of each of the 3 points of the triangle was a large dome with an amber glow that when viewed at close distance affected vision much like heat affecting air in a desert or on a highway. the domes were approximatly 30' in diameter and constant in color and light intensity. the overall size of the craft was around 150' along any one of the three sides. the hight or thickness of the craft is hard to say, yet i would approximate it to be 30-40'. at the very center of the craft was another dome the emmited no light, but rather anchored a complex array of ariels and antennas with apparaticies on the ends of some. the largest antenna was in the very center and came down maybe 20' or more from the bottom and was host to a slow pulsing red strobe, the only other light or color visable to me.
 for the first 30 seconds i didnt blink or move,... i knew what i was allowed to see. then reason struck, take a photo!!! not wanting to miss a single second of the event i franticly ran in my office to get the cammra the is allways by the photoprinter, it was not there. my wife had used it in the kitchen that day. in a frenzy i grabbed binoculars from the bookshelf and ran outside. it was winter, and with no leaves on the trees, i watched at 17x magnification the remaining minute or so of the event. the craft sailed sw toward downtown.
  i live in the flight-path of two very active airports, dallas luv, dfw airport and a smaller field in addison. this was no airplane. as a matter of fact, there were no airplanes in the sky, not one. this leads me to believe that the faa grounded, halted or rerouted airtraffic. 
 needless to say, i'm a beleiver now. this event has profoundly changed the way i view the world and its place in the cosmos, not negatively though.It sounds fantastic if now crazy, but i believe that i was allowed to view the alien spacecraft.
content.summary: Large silen triangle craft flew directly over my house at about 300 ft.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9:10 pm on october 9, 2008, my boyfriend had to leave so we said our goodbyes outside his car near the backyard of my house. i looked up at the moon and saw the clouds giving it that milky blue look and also noticed all the stars that were out. then from behind a pine tree in the side yard, a blue oval-like object shot across in front of the moon and its clouds (very fast as compared to the span of the sky) and it began to slow more as it neared the horizon, i ran into the lawn and watched as the object got smaller and smaller until it dissappeared, never going across the horizon, as if it flew further away from earth. i weighed the possibility of being a plane/jet any fast moving man-made object in the sky, but it was ruled out because it glowed blue and was half the size of the moon
content.summary: Shot across sky in front of both moon and clouds surrounding moon, began to slow towards horizon, got smaller then dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Before daylight, about 5:00 am,in batson, texas, i was awakened by my grandmother to get my camera;she and my two cousins were up and  noticed a flashing light in the distance that move dreally fast.Their first assumption was that it was indeed a ufo. the lights flashed really fast, and the object seemed to bounce up and down and side to side.When i first saw it, i was a little skeptical,it looked like one of those stars you sometimes see that twinkle different colors.But as i watched for a while, i knew it couldn't be a star because it was moving too much.And it couldn't be an airplane because it was moving too little. we watched it for a couple hours and it stayed put in the same spot.As the sun came up and the sky turned brighter, we could no longer see it. the lights were mostly white, but occasionally turned green or red/amber. i snapped some pictures and they looked nothing like your average plane /star in the sky.It was too nfar away to get a clear video with my digital camera, but i got a little footage also.
content.summary: Stayed in same spot but flashed and bounced around really fast,multicolored

content.detailedDescription:
At around 1:05am on 10/09/08 i was outside walking my dog the sky very clear and even with light pollution from a street light and the big annoying light on my garage, i could see more stars then i have ever seen before. that in itself was amazing but as i got to the end of my driveway a ball of light seemed to come out of no ware it must have come from behind me i estimate it about 40 or 50 feet off the ground, anyway the ball of light speed past directly over me and went across the street over the house   directly across from me and behind some trees, this ball of light moved so fast it seemed to have a tail.
this whole episode lasted about 2 seconds, and as i am only human i could have easily misjudged the distance off the ground. also the ball of light did seem to have a mixture of a electric sound and a whoosh type sound, i don���������t know how else to explain the sound.
also it seemed to me to be about the size of a basketball or a little larger.
this moved from east to west
content.summary: Ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from work. the clouds were amazing, beautiful giant stormclouds that rose right up high into the atmosphere, moving so fast you almost felt like that they were moving away at the same pace you were walking. 

it was while i was admiring the clouds that i saw something which was white. at first glance i saw it had a white trail behind it, same color, and as we're under plane airspace, i thought 'a plane skywriting'. (now that i think about that, it's odd to think that, because it was very high up, as high as the top of this huge storm cloud that reached high into the atmosphere, and who skywrites so near a stormcloud?) 

then it suddenly cut off. the white 'trail' cut off suddenly. i realized that this thing was all one object, not a white plane with a white trail, that the color was all the same. it was like a long thin white ...Worm, cigar, whatever. it must have been huge, it was so high up and yet it was about an inch long from where i stood.  

so i stood there amazed watching the white thing as it flew, really flew, really moved fast, right into a headwind. (against the direction of the clouds.) it continued till it was above another really high atmsophere cloud, and there i lost sight of it. 

but yeah, no question. it was not a plane, it was not a 'plane skywriting', it was something long and thin and very very white. i have the feeling that it didn't mind that i'd seen it, but i feel crazy admitting that.

it's not the first ufo i've seen in the past two weeks. i reported seeing one fifteen days ago as well, but it was a different shape and different color.

sighting was at location '62 piggot rd bellmere queensland australia' as viewable on google street maps. facing south south west. 


sorry about colors in pic, paint isn't very helpful. it wasn't quite that dark but it was sunset...
content.summary: Long white ufo.

content.detailedDescription: Ok at about 1:00 pm i was walking in constance lake first nation then some kind of upsidedown bowl landed in the saw dust.It hurted my eyes when i looked at it then i fell to the ground then it shifted its stands on the bottom then it took off.It looked like flashing lights then as soon as i blinked it was gone.I was scared it would take me so i jumped into a ditch then watched it from there.
content.summary: It looked like an upside down bowl

content.detailedDescription: On thursday december 22, 2005 at 7.40 p.M. that night i was on interstate 35 at exit 33 at the osceola creston exit on highway 34 from out of town. i just ate dinner at a roadside restaurant i looked up and saw 3 triangler ufos they were purple lighted with red dots on the corners they were a very bright purple. they hovered over the car and where i was at they were going east and i watched them as they hovered over the area. then they emitted blue and orange beams. and then they were yellow lighted with red dots on the corners. then all 3 of the ufos landed in a nearby field. so i drove down to look and they were a bunch of crows flying around the area where they landed and i found metal in the area where they landed. then i went back to the motel i was at and i saw no more ufos. it was partly cloudy that night the ufos i saw were going east when they disappeared and landed.
content.summary: While in osceola, iowa i was on the interstate and saw some triangler ufos.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog at the henry acuna park in montebello. the month is not remembered but the year was 2005 spring. the funny thing is not one person was there to witness it with me when usually there are at least a dozen people who are either jogging or walking their dogs. i was walking east when i looked straight ahead about 100 feet up in the air and one block away from where i was standing- a silver saucer sort of fat with red, blue, yellow lights all around the rim. i have always had an interest in ufo's and it happened on a day when i was not looking for one. it was still day light. a weird sense of calmness came over me. as i turned to look for other witnesses, i didn't find not one person. it was very strange. just me and my dog. i stopped and stared at it for at least two minutes which is a long time then suddenly (by the way no noise, it was just hoovering so still) the brightest, whitest light came out from the bottom of it, strectching straight down perfectly. i've never seen light like that. it slowly went straight down and obviously landed on someones yard as it was a typical neighborhood. i then began to continue on with my walk as if it was no big deal. i was very calm, which is strange because i should have ran to someones door to have them see it too! i never spoke about what i saw until a few weeks later.  i told everyone i knew and course no one beleived me but my mother who has also witnessed a "ufo" back in the late 60's with my german father who is pretty closed minded and even he will admit it was not of this world. i also witnessed a strange metallic almost fluid like large ball of whatever it was outside of the 737 airplane while landing in the ontario airport. the lady sitting in front of me screamed out. we both saw the same thing but the strangest thing again, is we didn't talk about it after that. we saw it clear as day flying side by side with the plane but got off the plane and didn't think twice about it. i do belive what i have witnessed on both occasions were our extended family from other worlds. i have a sense of why they are here and they don't frighten me. i am looking for witnesses to what i saw in the spring of 2005.
thank you,
sm
content.summary: Typical saucer (round) sliver in color and multi colors of lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was near the end of shooting about 300 photos of local autumn scenery and stopped at a friend's house to shoot the panoramic view of the moreno valley i knew could be seen from his main deck. while returning to my car, i noticed a flower pot on another small deck which juts out from the living room of his house about 12-15 feet above the driveway. the flowers hanging over the pot looked pretty against the bright blue cloudless sky, so i shot four pictures in a row of them, from about 20 feet away, using a telephoto lens. (the first shot was a "single;" the next three were a "burst.") the shots were aimed up toward the sky, slightly north, but mostly to the west. if there was any wind, i didn't notice it.

i noticed the object in photo one (of the four i shot of that scene) when quickly scanning through the photos as i transferred them from my camera to my computer. since i hadn't noticed anything in the sky when i shot the photo, i thought maybe the "object" resulted from a "glitch" in the camera. i made a copy of the photo at full size and enlarged it in photoshop, then enlarged the section with the object in it again and "enhanced" it using the photoshop unsharp mask filter at the following settings: amount-500; radius-25; threshold-15. in the enlarged enhanced view, the object appeared to be solid, and not the result of a camera malfunction. i checked and rechecked the other three photos of the same scene and found no trace of the object in any of them.

i mentally retraced my activities to determine the time when i shot the photo and then did test shots with the same camera to determine the amount of time which elapsed between the first and last photos in the scene (five seconds). 
   
i emailed copies of both the original photo and the enhanced enlargement of the object in the photo to folks i know in the ufo community asking for opinions. one person emailed back recommending i report to mufon to learn if someone else saw the same object.

camera: fuji s100, 12 megapixels. setting for all four photos: automatic. i have saved all four original photos.
content.summary: Noticed object in photo when transferring photos from camera to computer a few hours after i shot them.
